columns.comment: Status do produto: active (visível), blocked (bloqueado), deleted (soft delete)
columns.name: status

columns.comment: Configurações globais de estilo do checkout (cores, fontes, imagem de fundo)
columns.name: design

columns.comment: Array de componentes do checkout com suas configurações
columns.name: components

columns.comment: Status do checkout: active (público), deleted (soft delete), draft (em construção)
columns.name: status

columns.comment: Gateway de pagamento PIX configurado para este produto (pushinpay, mercadopago)
columns.name: pix_gateway

columns.comment: Gateway de pagamento de Cartão de Crédito configurado para este produto (mercadopago)
columns.name: credit_card_gateway

columns.comment: ID da transação PIX na PushinPay
columns.name: pix_id

columns.comment: Código QR Code do PIX (EMV)
columns.name: pix_qr_code

columns.comment: Status do PIX: created, paid, canceled
columns.name: pix_status

columns.comment: Data de criação do PIX
columns.name: pix_created_at

columns.comment: Data de confirmação do pagamento
columns.name: paid_at

comment: Payment orders. RLS enabled: vendors see only their orders. Service role bypasses for edge functions.
name: orders

comment: Payment gateway webhook events. RLS: vendors see only their events. Service role inserts from webhooks.
name: order_events

comment: Active checkout sessions. RLS: vendors see their own sessions. Service role manages heartbeat and cleanup.
name: checkout_sessions

columns.comment: Encrypted webhook HMAC secret using AES-256-GCM from crypto.ts. Use encrypt() before storing.
columns.name: secret_encrypted

comment: User configured webhooks. RLS: vendors manage their own. Secrets should be stored encrypted in secret_encrypted column.
name: outbound_webhooks

comment: Webhook delivery audit logs. Only accessible via edge functions (service role). Contains retry attempts and responses.
name: webhook_deliveries

comment: PIX payment transactions. RLS: vendors see their workspace transactions. Service role creates from payment gateway.
name: pix_transactions

comment: Maps order_id to pix_id. Only accessible via edge functions (service role). No direct user access.
name: payments_map

comment: System-wide health metrics and events for monitoring dashboard
name: system_health_logs

comment: Detailed error logs from edge functions for debugging and alerting
name: edge_function_errors

columns.comment: ID do pedido principal
columns.name: order_id

columns.comment: ID do produto comprado
columns.name: product_id

columns.comment: Nome do produto no momento da compra
columns.name: product_name

columns.comment: Valor do produto em centavos
columns.name: amount_cents

columns.comment: Quantidade comprada (geralmente 1)
columns.name: quantity

columns.comment: TRUE se for order bump, FALSE se for produto principal
columns.name: is_bump

comment: Armazena os produtos individuais de cada pedido (produto principal + order bumps)
name: order_items

columns.comment: ID do webhook
columns.name: webhook_id

columns.comment: ID do produto que dispara este webhook
columns.name: product_id

comment: Relacionamento N:N entre webhooks e produtos - permite que um webhook seja configurado para múltiplos produtos
name: webhook_products

comment: Logs de debug do sistema. Acesso restrito apenas ao service_role para evitar exposição de informações sensíveis.
name: trigger_debug_logs

columns.comment: Tipo de split: fixed (valor fixo), percentage (%), hybrid (fixo + %)
columns.name: split_type

columns.comment: Valor fixo em reais a ser cobrado (ex: 2.00 = R$ 2,00)
columns.name: fixed_amount

columns.comment: Percentual a ser cobrado (ex: 2.50 = 2.5%)
columns.name: percentage_amount

comment: Configurações de split do Mercado Pago por vendedor
name: mercadopago_split_config
